name: Zebra Unicorn
text: Whenever Zebra Unicorn deals damage, you gain that much life.

editions.flavor:
"I'll capture gentle zebras / for your steeds and fill the stable with every kind of unicorn."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Zedruu the Greathearted
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of permanents you own that your opponents control.
{R}{W}{U}: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

name: Zektar Shrine Expedition
text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Zektar Shrine Expedition.
Remove three quest counters from Zektar Shrine Expedition and sacrifice it: Create a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Zelyon Sword
text:
You may choose not to untap Zelyon Sword during your untap step.
{3}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 for as long as Zelyon Sword remains tapped.

editions.flavor: No sheath shall hold what finds its home in flesh.

name: Zendikar Farguide
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

editions.flavor: Expeditions follow the paths it leaves in its wake.

name: Zendikar Incarnate
text: Zendikar Incarnate's power is equal to the number of lands you control.

editions.flavor: "Her people angered Zendikar, and they faced the land's wrath. That is why Nissa is the last of the animists."—Numa, Joraga chieftain

name: Zendikar Resurgent
text:
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced. (The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.)
Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

name: Zendikar's Roil
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 green Elemental creature token.

editions.flavor: "I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain."—Nissa Revane

name: Zenith Seeker
text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Only from the sky can one fully understand the horrors of the wastes and the wonder of the Hekma's protection.

name: Zephid
text:
Flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

editions.flavor: Once you've seen one, you'll understand why spells won't go near them.

name: Zephid's Embrace
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

editions.flavor: Spells will shun you, as will everyone else.

name: Zephyr Charge
text: {1}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"All armies prefer high ground to low and sunny places to dark."
—Sun Tzu, Art of War, trans. Giles

name: Zephyr Falcon
text: Flying, vigilance

editions.flavor: Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.
Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.
Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.
Although greatly prized among falconers, the zephyr falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.
Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.

name: Zephyr Net
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender and flying.

editions.flavor: Faeries hang beings that interest them as ornaments in the sky, each clique competing to outshine the prize of the last.

name: Zephyr Scribe
text:
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Zephyr Scribe.

editions.flavor:
"Ojutai's rule has allowed Tarkir's monks to learn from the truly enlightened."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Zephyr Spirit
text: When Zephyr Spirit blocks, return it to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: A spiteful force exists on Ravnica that binds these ghosts to the land of the living but forbids them to touch it.

name: Zephyr Sprite
text: Flying

editions.flavor: "I've never understood why so many beings lumber around on the ground. There are three dimensions, yet they use only two."

name: Zerapa Minotaur
text:
First strike
{2}: Zerapa Minotaur loses first strike until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

editions.flavor: There's no difference between bone and crystal when it's piercing your throat.

name: Zhalfirin Commander
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."
—Sidar Jabari

"Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."
—Sidar Jabari

"Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Zhalfirin Crusader
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zhalfirin Crusader this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.

editions.flavor:
"War is the crucible of leadership."
—Rashida Scalebane

"War is the crucible of leadership."
—Rashida Scalebane

name: Zhalfirin Knight
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{W}{W}: Zhalfirin Knight gains first strike until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"You returned a warrior. . . . Your hair was cut, your eye tattooed with the red triangle of war."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Zhang Fei, Fierce Warrior
text: Vigilance; horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

editions.flavor: Zhang Fei's uncharacteristic alliance with a defeated Riverlands general, Yan Yan, allowed Shu forces to advance through forty-five Riverlands strongpoints with no casualties.
Zhang Fei's uncharacteristic alliance with a defeated Riverlands general, Yan Yan, allowed Shu forces to advance through forty-five Riverlands strongpoints with no casualties.

name: Zhang He, Wei General
text:
Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
Whenever Zhang He, Wei General attacks, each other creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Zhang Liao, Hero of Hefei
text: Whenever Zhang Liao, Hero of Hefei deals damage to an opponent, that opponent discards a card.

name: Zhao Zilong, Tiger General
text:
Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
Whenever Zhao Zilong, Tiger General blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Zhao Zilong was a brave and noble warrior. Twice he rescued Liu Bei's son, Liu Shan.

name: Zhou Yu, Chief Commander
text: Zhou Yu, Chief Commander can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

editions.flavor:
"After making me, Zhou Yu, did you have to make Kongming?"
—Zhou Yu crying to heaven on his deathbed

name: Zhuge Jin, Wu Strategist
text: {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

editions.flavor: When Zhuge Jin proposed the marriage of Guan Yu's daugher and Sun Quan's heir, Guan Yu's arrogant refusal led to disaster.

name: Zhur-Taa Ancient
text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

editions.flavor: Many Ravnicans think of nature as orderly groves and elf-tended rot farms. They haven't seen the Gruul wilds.

name: Zhur-Taa Druid
text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

editions.flavor: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."
"Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."
"Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."

name: Zhur-Taa Swine
text: Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Zhur-Taa Swine: Target attacking creature gets +5/+4 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Gurley was the first to domesticate one, though his widow didn't take much solace in that accomplishment.

name: Zirilan of the Claw
text: {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. That Dragon gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Zodiac Dog
text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

editions.flavor: ". . . Jiang Wei alone still strove with might and main: / Nine times more he fought the north—in vain. . . ."

name: Zodiac Dragon
text: When Zodiac Dragon is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may return it to your hand.

editions.flavor: ". . . The kingdoms three are now the stuff of dream, / For men to ponder, past all praise or blame."
". . . The kingdoms three are now the stuff of dream,/ For men to ponder, past all praise or blame."

name: Zodiac Goat
text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

editions.flavor: ". . . Near death in Baidi, having reigned three years, / Bei sadly placed his son in Kongming's care. . . ."

name: Zodiac Horse
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

editions.flavor: ". . . ‘First take Jingzhou, next the Riverlands; / On that rich region, base your own royal stand.' . . ."

name: Zodiac Monkey
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

editions.flavor: It lives mainly on fruit, leaves, and the occasional nose.

". . . By six offensives from the hills of Qi
Kongming sought to change Han's destiny. . . ."

name: Zodiac Ox
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

editions.flavor: ". . . Cao's abdication changed the face of all; / No mighty battles marked the Southland's fall. . . ."

name: Zodiac Pig
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

editions.flavor: ". . . Zhong Hui and Deng Ai next led armies west: / And to the Cao, Han's hills and streams now passed. . . ."

name: Zodiac Rabbit
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

editions.flavor: ". . . The world's affairs rush on, an endless stream; / A sky-told fate, infinite in reach, dooms all. . . ."

name: Zodiac Rat
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

editions.flavor: " . . . Cao Pi, Cao Rui, Fang, Mao, and briefly, Huan— / The Sima took the empire in their turn. . . ."

name: Zodiac Rooster
text: Plainswalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)

editions.flavor: ". . . But the time of Han had run—could he Kongming not tell?— / That night his master star fell past the hills. . . ."

name: Zodiac Snake
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

editions.flavor: "Thrice Xuande's ardent quest led to Nanyang, / Where Sleeping Dragon unveiled Han's partition: . . ."

name: Zodiac Tiger
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

editions.flavor: ". . . Three kings no more—Chenliu, Guiming, Anle. / The fiefs and posts must now be filled anew. . . ."

name: Zoetic Cavern
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.

name: Zof Shade
text: {2}{B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: It haunts the remnants of the Helix of Zof, leeching strength from the vast Eldrazi ruin.
Shades are drawn to places of power, often rooting themselves in a single area to feed.

name: Zombie Apocalypse
text: Return all Zombie creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped, then destroy all Humans.

editions.flavor:
"There will come a day so dark you will pray for death. On that day your prayers will be answered."
—Minaldra, the Vizag Atum

name: Zombie Assassin
text: {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard and Zombie Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor:
"Zombies don't kill. They recruit."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Zombie Boa
text: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

editions.flavor: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.

name: Zombie Brute
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Trample

editions.flavor: Measure its determination by the screams of its prey.

name: Zombie Cannibal
text: Whenever Zombie Cannibal deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target card from that player's graveyard.

editions.flavor: Nothing is sacred to the undead—not even their own kind.

name: Zombie Cutthroat
text: Morph—Pay 5 life. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: The single-mindedness of a zombie, the cunning of an assassin.

name: Zombie Fanboy
text:
As Zombie Fanboy comes into play, choose an artist.
Whenever a permanent by the chosen artist is put into a graveyard, put two +1/+1 counters on Zombie Fanboy.

editions.flavor: The real advantage of being a zombie gamer? No one notices the stench.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis

editions.flavor:
"Phirax of Blood Ridge has sent a war giant at us? What, do I have to spell it out for you? Kill the giant, scoop out its skull, and drive it back to Blood Ridge. Honestly, what kind of necromancer minions are you?"
—Keren-Dur, necromancer lord

"Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

"Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."

text: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

editions.flavor: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.

Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

editions.flavor: He controlled the zombies even before his own death; now nothing can make them betray him.

name: Zombie Mob
text:
Zombie Mob enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard.
When Zombie Mob enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards from your graveyard.

name: Zombie Musher
text:
Snow landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow land.)
{S}: Regenerate Zombie Musher. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

editions.flavor: The World Spell thawed their icy graves, promising rest in soft, quiet earth at last. But Heidar called them to duty for a twisted cause.

name: Zombie Outlander
text: Protection from green

editions.flavor: The ripe smell of life drifted into Grixis. The dead caught the scent and with reckless hunger followed it back into Jund.

name: Zombie Scavengers
text: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Regenerate Zombie Scavengers.

editions.flavor:
"Pick a shell upon my shore and put it to your ear. That sound isn't the sea, but the whispers of the fallen."
—Crovax

name: Zombie Trailblazer
text:
Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn.
Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

editions.flavor: Some zombies are natural-reborn leaders.

name: Zombify
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

editions.flavor:
"The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."
—Mystic elder

"The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."
—Mystic elder

"The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."
—Mystic elder

"The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."
—Mystic elder

name: Zoologist
text: {3}{G}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

editions.flavor: "With friends like these, who needs people?"

name: Zo-Zu the Punisher
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Zo-Zu the Punisher deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

editions.flavor: He does not tolerate intruders.

"He can cause a lot of pain and do it with no fuss. That's all good, but I just wish he didn't do it to us"
—Ku-Ku, akki poet

name: Zuberi, Golden Feather
text:
Flying
Other Griffin creatures get +1/+1.

editions.flavor:
"If the griffins tell of their gods, perhaps they speak of feathers bright as the Sun."
—Afari, Tales

name: Zulaport Chainmage
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Target opponent loses 2 life.

editions.flavor: The chains obey her. Everything else would do best to get out of her way.

name: Zulaport Cutthroat
text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

editions.flavor: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now that's dangerous."

name: Zulaport Enforcer
text:
Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-2
3/3

5/5

name: Zuo Ci, the Mocking Sage
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Zuo Ci, the Mocking Sage can't be blocked by creatures with horsemanship.

name: Zuran Enchanter
text: {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

editions.flavor:
"We are Kjeldorans no more."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Zuran Orb
text: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.

editions.flavor:
"I will go to any length to achieve my goal. Eternal life is worth any sacrifice."
—Zur the Enchanter

"I will go to any length to achieve my goal. Eternal life is worth any sacrifice."
—Zur the Enchanter

"I will go to any length to achieve my goal. Eternal life is worth any sacrifice."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Zuran Spellcaster
text: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor:
"A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever."
—Zur the Enchanter

"A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever."
—Zur the Enchanter

"A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Zurgo Bellstriker
text:
Zurgo Bellstriker can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Zurgo Helmsmasher
text:
Haste
Zurgo Helmsmasher attacks each combat if able.
Zurgo Helmsmasher has indestructible as long as it's your turn.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Zurgo Helmsmasher this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Zurgo Helmsmasher.

name: Zur's Weirding
text:
Players play with their hands revealed.
If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.

name: Zur the Enchanter
text:
Flying
Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.
Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.

name: Zzzyxas's Abyss
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all nonland permanents with the first name alphabetically among nonland permanents in play.

editions.flavor: Tired of always being picked last, the wizard Zzzyxas created the ultimate revenge.
